```{r} 

install.packages("ggplot2")
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = mtcars) + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = wt, y = mpg, color = as.factor(cyl))) +
  labs(title = "Car Weight vs. Fuel Efficiency",
       x = "Weight (1000 lbs)",
       y = "Miles per Gallon",
       color = "Cylinders")
```
